We have no hesitation in recommending their home to anyone who would like to spend a quiet, comfortable and homely stay in Waite Park, Minnesota.

Brent and Melissa's home was very comforting and inviting. I had no trouble finding the house and it was in a very nice neighborhood. Had I stayed longer I may have even taken a walk around. They have a very friendly house cat named Kitty who I just adored and fell in love with.

Melissa and Brent were fantastic hosts and the bed and pillows were super comfy. I arrived after a very long drive so I was to tired to talk in the evening but had a lovely chat with Melissa in the morning. My favorite part of the stay was pinning their map that shows were all their AirBNB guests have been from.

Brent and Melissa's home was perfect for our weekend. Very clean and comfortable with great proximity to St Bens. Much nicer feel than any expensive hotel option. The communication for check in quick and easy. We would definitely stay here again!

Staying at this sweet young couple's charming house was a delight. Everything was clean, tidy and comfortable. The location is fantastic, Melissa and Brent are kind and interesting and they didn't seem to get sick of me.....even on day five. "Kitty" is one the friendliest cats ever and kept me company quite often while I was working on schoolwork. I look forward to my next stay already!

With both Brent and Melissa working, it was a treat to have Kitty welcome me upon arrival. The house is just as lovely as the pictures and description claim and the room was very clean and comfortable as was the bathroom. The only negative would be was having the bathroom directly off the living room when I would come in to get ready for bed in the evenings; but most nights the hosts were not even there, so it was not even a problem, and they were gracious to allow me use of their bathroom upstairs throughout the night when I awoke. I also felt quite at home in using the kitchen and dining room for my needs in cooking and eating. I would definitely recommend Brent and Melissa as host's in anyone's travel plans.
Really nice house and hosts. Close to shopping and parks, and on a quiet street. The price is good and all necessary items included.
We had a great stay! We were made to feel very welcome and comfortable.

Melissa was a great host and made me feel very welcome. Kitty also rolled out the red carpet - she is the most affectionate cat ever! The room is on the small side but has everything you'd need, with a decent sized closet. The house overall is absolutely spotless and they've decorated it really well. The kitchen is also well stocked if you need to cook. If my travels ever take me back to Waite Park again I will be staying here!

Melissa was SO incredibly sweet! She greeted me and had two lovely kinds of tea waiting for the snowy day that had just happened. We got to sit and chat and talk about travel; something we both love! The room is nice and quiet and even a pillowy mask was provided to keep out the morning light. Had a great stay with Brent and Melissa!

Brent and Melissa were amazing!! Brent welcomed me when I arrived and gave me a tour of the house. It was great. I got to meet Melissa once she got off and she was so friendly. I would definitely recommend their place for someone looking to stay in the area.

I made this booking for a young lady travelling to the US for the first time. Brent & Melissa were so helpful when taking the booking and so kind and helpful when the young lady was staying with them. Lovely, comfortable room. Can't express how grateful I am to Brent and Melissa. Really good people!!!

Brent and Melissa were amazing hosts! My friend and I were traveling through so we were in need of a relaxing environment and that is exactly what we got and more! Unfortunately Melissa had to be at work while we were there but Brent was home to greet us and show us our room and the amenities. They were both a huge help messaging before and even had fruit for us to have in the morning and take on the road!
Brent and Melissa are welcoming and friendly hosts - as was their cat! Their house is very clean and tidy and was an excellent location close to downtown. I'd highly recommend this spot.

I stayed with Brent and Melissa for a long-term stay while I working a 4 month contract in the area. Their home was a great fit for my long term purposes as Brent and Melissa are great people, I had my own bathroom space, Melissa opened her kitchen to me, and covered parking. (I never had to scrape off my windshield before work!) My stay was very comfortable and I would recommend staying here for a short or long stay!

Wonderful experience in a very spacious, organized and comfortable home. Excellent location. Melissa and Brent are great hosts who made me feel right at home. I look forward to staying with them during my next trip to St. Cloud.

These two were amazing! So thoughtful and flexible. There house is well maintained and comfortable. We slept upstairs and got a good nights sleep before and after a friend's wedding. Thanks for everything :)

Brent & Melissa were fantastic hosts. They are super nice and their house is clean and welcoming. They also have a very sweet and affectionate cat. We stayed in a comfortable bedroom and were given a private bathroom. We would gladly stay there again and would recommend them to others without hesitation. Thanks Brent and Melissa!

Wow, are these people nice! They made us feel at home right away. They have a nice booklet including nearby attractions, which made it very easy for us to set our schedule. They even made an last-minute adjustment to our itinerary--flexible and nice people. To top it all off, they left US with a thank you card. Nice!
Brent and Melissa's house was immaculate and has the friendliest cat ever. We met Melissa only briefly, having arrived late the night before, but thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Staying at Melissa and Brent's place was so rewarding that I don't even know where to start. I may say it has been my best AirBnB experience so far. She is very friendly and their house is beautiful and comfortable. It just perfectly organized and full of details that makes it feels like home in every single corner. I am really thankful of having find her place. She is the perfect host and will make you feel you are really at home. Brent is rather quiet but friendly at the same time, which was totally fine since my son who stayed with me at their home is the same :D
If you have to choose within other places, chose this one, you won't regret it. Thank you Melissa, Brent, and of course Kitty, for making us feel very comfortable. We were very happy to meet you and stayed at your lovely home <3

My stay with Melissa and Brett was short and sweet. Though we did not have an opportunity to get to know each other due to my schedule, they were more than accommodating for a pleasant stay and a possible late check-in (thanks again, Melissa for being hospitable when I arrived super early!!). The home and bedroom were cozy and comfy-- Which was nice to come home to at the end of the night. Upon checking out, a note was left for me which made my stay even sweeter.

Brent and Melissa are great. from the beginning the communication was quick, and accurate. Check in was a breeze, with easy access in and out of the house. the neighborhood is safe, good for walking, with well manicured lawns. The neighborhood feels residential, and you are within walking distance of twenty five to thirty restaurants, and a quick drive to downtown St Cloud. The house is very clean, the room has a comfortable bed, and ample closet space with plenty of extra blankets if you needed. They have an awesome cat that is a real lover. if you don't like cats you can just keep your bedroom door shut. If you plans take to you St Cloud I highly recommend staying here.
